description: Multiple VICTORIA-Class Spares : CIRCUIT CARD ASSEMBLY; BUZZER,ELECTRONIC; SONETICS HEADBAND; CONNECTOR,ELECTRICAL,PLUG,SHELL SIZE; SWITCH,PUSH
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number: cb-394-95931166
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Solicitation Number: W8482-242304/A

**Notice Type:**
The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of multiple VICTORIA-Class spares.

**Procurement Overview:**
The subject procurement includes the purchase of electronic components and personal communications device accessories. The delivery locations are CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Items:**
1. Circuit Card Assembly (Part No. 007014979, NCAGE: K2516) - Quantity: 35 (CFB Esquimalt)
2. Circuit Card Assembly (Part No. 007014979, NCAGE: K2516) - Quantity: 20 (CFB Halifax)
3. Electronic Buzzer (Part No. GA100-1, NCAGE: K5081 / Part No. T22S039024, NCAGE: KC6K3) - Quantity: 10 (CFB Esquimalt)
4. Electronic Buzzer (Part No. GA100-1, NCAGE: K5081 / Part No. T22S039024, NCAGE: KC6K3) - Quantity: 7 (CFB Halifax)
5. Sonetics Headband (Part No. 114-0143-00, NCAGE: 0SEA5) - Quantity: 30 (CFB Esquimalt)
6. Sonetics Headband (Part No. 114-0143-00, NCAGE: 0SEA5) - Quantity: 30 (CFB Halifax)
7. Electrical Connector (Part No. 280-018P2S15MENL, NCAGE: 6D470) - Quantity: 10 (CFB Esquimalt)
8. Electrical Connector (Part No. 280-018P2S15MENL, NCAGE: 6D470) - Quantity: 10 (CFB Halifax)
9. Electronic Switch (Part No. 90HA1C5F3J1WL1N1, NCAGE: 96182 / Part No. 90HA1C5F3J1WL1N1, NCAGE: U0F31) - Quantity: 15 (CFB Esquimalt)
10. Electronic Switch (Part No. 90HA1C5F3J1WL1N1
